content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia involving two parties the supreme court issued a judgment on september 6 2018 regarding the costs involved in the case the plaintiff was initially awarded compensation but the supreme court ruled that the defendant should be reimbursed for their costs the court determined that the plaintiff is entitled to 66 of the property in question while the defendant is entitled to 34 the case involves a dispute over the ownership of a property specifically an apartment the lower courts made errors in their calculations and the supreme court is now reviewing the case the defendant is appealing the judgment of the lower courts and requesting a new trial the court also addressed the costs of the appeal and review proceedings ruling that both parties should bear the costs of the appeal but the plaintiff is responsible for reimbursing the defendant for the costs of the review proceedings

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 225/2016, 6. 9. 2018
